text: (Lagdacha) catyangale tiniharuko amkhako (jyoti) turuntai khosdai cha. Jaba catyangale tiniharumathi prakasa chardacha taba tiniharu hinddula gardachan, ra jaba amdhyaro huncha taba ubhirahanchan. Ra yadi allahale cahema tiniharuka kana ra amkhala'i niskrya garidincha. Nihsandeha allaha hareka kuramathi sarvasakti sampanna cha
